articles.description: Borussia Dortmund expect England winger Jadon Sancho to stay at the Bundesliga club this summer.
articles.content:
Borussia Dortmund expect Jadon Sancho to stay at the club this summer.
However, a source close to the 20-year-old has told Sky Sports News a move away from Dortmund is still likely as he is unlikely to extend his current contract, which expires in 2022.

articles.description: Captain says Manchester United have been their own worst enemy this season as he sets silverware target for when football resumes following coronavirus pandemic
articles.content:
